attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.name: Team Magma's Torkoal
rules: This Pokémon is both Fire Darkness type.

attacks.name: Magma Burn
attacks.text: Discard the top card from your opponent's deck, and flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Team Magma's Torkoal.

attacks.name: Hot Air
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Team Magma's Torkoal and your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon, if any.

attacks.name: Power Generation
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for up to 2 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand.

attacks.name: Scorching Smoke
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned. Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy card attached to Torkoal.

data.name: Torkoal

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.

data.name: Torkoal

attacks.name: High-Pressure Heat
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's High-Pressure Heat attack does 50 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Coal is the source of Torkoal's energy. Large amounts of coal can be found in the mountains where they live.

data.name: Torkoal

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: Coal is the source of Torkoal's energy. Large amounts of coal can be found in the mounts where they live.

data.name: Torkoal

attacks.name: Flame Cloak
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.

data.name: Torkoal V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Combustion Pillar
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a Fire Energy card, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Steam Crush
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cry for Help
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Fire Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex), show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Fireworks
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Torkoal.

data.name: Torkoal

abilities.name: Hot Snort
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you put Torkoal from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.

data.name: Torkoal

attacks.name: Fire Fling
attacks.text: Put 4 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Kindle
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.flavorText: You can tell how it's feeling by the smoke spouting from its shell. Tremendous velocity is a sign of good health.

data.name: Torkoal

attacks.name: Flaming Honk
attacks.text: Discard the top 4 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Fire Energy cards, attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: If the fire burning within its shell goes out, it will die. Those who wish to raise one in their home must always keep something flammable at hand.

attacks.name: Grind
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Torkoal.

data.name: Torkoal

abilities.name: White Smoke
abilities.text: As long as Torkoal is your Active Pokémon, prevent all effects, including damage, done to your Benched Pokémon by your opponent's attacks.

attacks.name: Black Soot
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.

data.name: Torkoal

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.text: Move an Energy card attached to Torkoal to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
